TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_pslkotas, title = pslkotas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/pslkotas} }

S.FORM: pslkotas babaw kmnloh 'bagan lga, pslkotas qu qalang Tayal la. msli kuwara qu qutux niqan, qmasuw pcyuwagun, psqqas grhuw ryax. tehuk ryax lga, msqun tegalu ki mlawa Utux Wagiq ru utux bnkis, msqun mquwas ru mzyugi smqqas ki mplaw maniq. pslkotas hya ga psqutux inlungan qalang ki 'mubuy psglabang gaga Tayal.

pslkotas babaw kmnloh 'bagan lga, pslkotas qo qalang Tayal la. msli kowara qo qotox niqan, qmasow pcyowagon, psqqas grhow ryax. tehok ryax lga, msqon tegalo ki mlawa Utox Wagiq ro otox bnkis, msqon mqowas ro mzyogi smqqas ki mplaw maniq. pslkotas hya ga psqotox inlongan qalang ki 'moboy psglabang gaga Tayal.
